UniprotID	Q9BRF8
Accession	Q9BRF8;B4DQ68;Q6MZY9;Q9H9M9;Q9NUT6
EntryName	CPPED_HUMAN
ProteinName	Serine/threonine-protein phosphatase CPPED1 (EC 3.1.3.16) (Calcineurin-like phosphoesterase domain-containing protein 1) (Complete S-transactivated protein 1)
GeneName	CPPED1 CSTP1
Length	314
Function	Protein phosphatase that dephosphorylates AKT family kinase specifically at 'Ser-473', blocking cell cycle progression and promoting cell apoptosis. May play an inhibitory role in glucose uptake by adipocytes.
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
